https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7kjwIUwqTOxesog6SwyriLAg761.jpg Kat receives a weekend at a couples retreat as a gift from her mother, even though she and her boyfriend had broken up six month prior. Kat's friend Samantha proposes that they pretend to be a couple and go there anyway. BFFs
